mapper.sql: INV_TYP, IV_BEG_NO, IV_END_NO, TOL_NUM, OPR_TLR, REG_TLR, NODNO, TCK_NO, REG_DAT, SEQ_NO, USE_DAT, CHK_DAT, USE_NUM, CLR_NUM, STATUS
mapper.insert:
insert into ${GDEUPSB_SCHEMA}.GDEUPS_INV_DTL_BOK
INV_TYP,
IV_BEG_NO,
IV_END_NO,
TOL_NUM,
OPR_TLR,
REG_TLR,
NODNO,
TCK_NO,
REG_DAT,
SEQ_NO,
USE_DAT,
CHK_DAT,
USE_NUM,
CLR_NUM,
STATUS,
#{invTyp,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{ivBegNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{ivEndNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{tolNum,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{oprTlr,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{regTlr,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{nodno,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{tckNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{regDat,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{seqNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{useDat,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{chkDat,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{useNum,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{clrNum,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
mapper.select:
select
from ${GDEUPSB_SCHEMA}.GDEUPS_INV_DTL_BOK WHERE Inv_Typ=#{invTyp,jdbcType=CHAR} AND ((Iv_Beg_No <= #{ivBegNo,jdbcType=CHAR} and Iv_End_No >= #{ivBegNo,jdbcType=CHAR}) OR (Iv_Beg_No < #{ivEndNo,jdbcType=CHAR} and Iv_End_No >=#{ivEndNo,jdbcType=CHAR} ))
